original: @471b / /rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @471b / /rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya manydzu shr'i bhatta ra ka sya pradzny'a buddhi barbha na n'a ma dha ra n'i /
analyzed: a'arya manydzu shr'i bhatta ra ka sya pradzny'a buddhi barbha na n'a ma dha ra n'i /
translated: Ārya-mañjuśrī-bhāṣita-prajñā-buddhi-vardhanā-nāma-dhāraṇī

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi shes rab dang / blo 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
analyzed: rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi shes rab dang / blo 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
translated: The Dhāraṇī Called “The Increase of Wisdom and Intelligence Spoken by the Noble Mañjuśrī”

original: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels!

original: na mo manydzu shr'i ye ku m'a ra bhu t'a ya /
analyzed: na mo manydzu shr'i ye ku m'a ra bhu t'a ya /
translated: Homage to Mañjuśrī Kumārabhūta!

original: ta dya th'a /
analyzed: ta dya th'a /
translated: Tadyathā:

original: aom aa ra dze bi ra dze /🔽shud dhe bi shud dhe /
analyzed: aom aa ra dze bi ra dze / shud dhe bi shud dhe /
translated: Oṃ araje viraje🔽śudhe viśudhe

original: sho dha ni bi sho dha ni /
analyzed: sho dha ni bi sho dha ni /
translated: śodhani viśodhani

original: sho dha ya bi sho dha ya /
analyzed: sho dha ya bi sho dha ya /
translated: śodhaya viśodhaya

original: aa ma le bi ma le dza ya ba ti ru ru tsa le h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aa ma le bi ma le dza ya ba ti ru ru tsa le h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: amale vimalaye jayavatī rucivale hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: gang zhig 'di 'dzin pa de zla ba gcig gis blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang zhig 'di 'dzin pa de zla ba gcig gis blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Whoever holds this will become wise within one month.

original: dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will have a pleasant voice.

original: gzugs bzang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs bzang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will have a beautiful form.

original: lan gcig bklags na bskal pa stong gi bar du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lan gcig bklags na bskal pa stong gi bar du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: By reading it once, they will turn away from saṃsāra for a thousand eons.

original: bcangs pa tsam gyis skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bcangs pa tsam gyis skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
translated: Merely by holding it, one will remember one’s past lives.

original: 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na mkhas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na mkhas par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one recites it one hundred thousand times, one will become learned.

original: 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //🔽'bum phrag @472a *//
analyzed: 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro // 'bum phrag @472a *//
translated: If one recites it two hundred thousand times, one will become a knowledge-holder.

original: gsum bzlas na 'jam dpal gyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsum bzlas na 'jam dpal gyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one recites it three hundred thousand times, one will see Mañjuśrī’s face.

original: gal te mtshams med pa lnga byas pas grub par ma gyur na de'i tshe nga nyid mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yin zhing /
analyzed: gal te mtshams med pa lnga byas pas grub par ma gyur na de'i tshe nga nyid mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yin zhing /
translated: If one does not succeed even though one has committed the five acts of immediate retribution, then at that time I myself will have committed the five acts of immediate retribution.

original: nga nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyur cig /
analyzed: nga nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyur cig /
translated: I myself will have deceived the blessed buddhas.

original: rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi shes rab dang / blo 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so //
analyzed: rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi shes rab dang / blo 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so //
translated: The dhāraṇī called “The Increase of Wisdom and Intelligence of the Noble Mañjuśrī, the Lord” is complete.
